name: Magnetic Unfair
description:
Magnetic Unfair is the remake version of my previous game Magnetic Affair. 

The original game is a multi-ending sliding puzzle game with narrative of a love-triangle story based on magnetism push - pull interactions.

The goal for each level is simply moving any sphere to the finish line (the yellow block).

Encouraged by tungkradle, I remade the game in Unreal Engine 4 with a 3D neon style with electric effects & sounds.

Controls:

The controls are inspired by Quell+ game but with multiple spheres moving at once and interact with each other.

  • Player uses Arrow keys to move all spheres in desired direction.
  • Blue spheres push each other while attracted by the pink sphere.
